</tns:rootPolicyRef>
Included in content model of elements (1):
tns:pdp
Annotation
Identifies the root policy from which the policy evaluation begins. This identifier must be resolved by the Policy Provider configured previously (cf. 'policyProvider' element).
XML Source (w/o annotations (1); see within schema source)
<element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="rootPolicyRef" type="tns:TopLevelPolicyElementRef"/>
